20 #ifndef RANGE_H__INCLUDED
21 #define RANGE_H__INCLUDED
22 
23 #include <TiledArray/range.h>
24 #include <TiledArray/tiled_range1.h>
25 
26 namespace TiledArray {
27 
29 
32 class TiledRange {
33  private:
35  void init() {
36  const std::size_t rank = this->rank();
37 
38  // Indices used to store range start and finish.
39  std::vector<size_type> start;
40  std::vector<size_type> finish;
41  std::vector<size_type> start_element;
42  std::vector<size_type> finish_element;
43 
44  start.reserve(rank);
45  finish.reserve(rank);
46  start_element.reserve(rank);
47  finish_element.reserve(rank);
48 
49  // Find the start and finish of the over all tiles and element ranges.
50  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < rank; ++i) {
51  start.push_back(ranges_[i].tiles_range().first);
52  finish.push_back(ranges_[i].tiles_range().second);
53 
54  start_element.push_back(ranges_[i].elements_range().first);
55  finish_element.push_back(ranges_[i].elements_range().second);
56  }
57  range_type(start, finish).swap(range_);
58  range_type(start_element, finish_element).swap(elements_range_);
59  }
60 
61  public:
62  // typedefs
63  typedef TiledRange TiledRange_;
64  typedef Range range_type; // represents elements/tiles range
65  typedef std::size_t size_type;
66  typedef range_type::index index;
67  typedef range_type::size_array size_array;
68  typedef std::vector<TiledRange1> Ranges;
69 
71  TiledRange() : range_(), elements_range_(), ranges_() {}
72 
74  template <typename InIter>
75  TiledRange(InIter first, InIter last)
76  : range_(), elements_range_(), ranges_(first, last) {
77  init();
78  }
79 
81  TiledRange(
82  const std::initializer_list<std::initializer_list<size_type>>& list)
83  : range_(), elements_range_(), ranges_(list.begin(), list.end()) {
84  init();
85  }
86 
88  TiledRange(const std::initializer_list<TiledRange1>& list)
89  : range_(), elements_range_(), ranges_(list.begin(), list.end()) {
90  init();
91  }
92 
94  TiledRange(const TiledRange_& other)
95  : range_(other.range_),
96  elements_range_(other.elements_range_),
97  ranges_(other.ranges_) {}
98 
100 
102  TiledRange_& operator=(const TiledRange_& other) {
103  if (this != &other) TiledRange_(other).swap(*this);
104  return *this;
105  }
106 
108 
110  TiledRange_& operator*=(const Permutation& p) {
111  TA_ASSERT(p.dim() == range_.rank());
112  Ranges temp = p * ranges_;
113  TiledRange(temp.begin(), temp.end()).swap(*this);
114  return *this;
115  }
116 
118 
120  const range_type& tiles_range() const { return range_; }
121 
123 
126  [[deprecated]] const range_type& tiles() const { return tiles_range(); }
127 
129 
131  const range_type& elements_range() const { return elements_range_; }
132 
134 
137  [[deprecated]] const range_type& elements() const { return elements_range(); }
138 
140 
146  range_type tile(const size_type& i) const { return make_tile_range(i); }
147 
149 
153  range_type make_tile_range(const size_type& i) const {
154  TA_ASSERT(tiles_range().includes(i));
155  return make_tile_range(tiles_range().idx(i));
156  }
157 
159 
165  template <typename Index>
166  typename std::enable_if<!std::is_integral<Index>::value, range_type>::type
167  tile(const Index& index) const {
168  return make_tile_range(index);
169  }
170 
172 
176  template <typename Index>
177  typename std::enable_if<!std::is_integral<Index>::value, range_type>::type
178  make_tile_range(const Index& index) const {
179  const auto rank = range_.rank();
180  TA_ASSERT(index.size() == rank);
181  TA_ASSERT(range_.includes(index));
182  typename range_type::index lower;
183  typename range_type::index upper;
184  lower.reserve(rank);
185  upper.reserve(rank);
186  unsigned d = 0;
187  for (const auto& index_d : index) {
188  lower.push_back(data()[d].tile(index_d).first);
189  upper.push_back(data()[d].tile(index_d).second);
190  ++d;
191  }
192 
193  return range_type(lower, upper);
194  }
195 
197 
203  template <typename Integer>
204  range_type tile(const std::initializer_list<Integer>& index) const {
205  return make_tile_range(index);
206  }
207 
209 
213  template <typename Integer>
214  range_type make_tile_range(
215  const std::initializer_list<Integer>& index) const {
216  return make_tile_range<std::initializer_list<Integer>>(index);
217  }
218 
220 
224  template <typename Index>
225  typename std::enable_if<!std::is_integral<Index>::value,
226  typename range_type::index>::type
227  element_to_tile(const Index& index) const {
228  const unsigned int rank = range_.rank();
229  typename range_type::index result;
230  result.reserve(rank);
231  for (size_type i = 0; i < rank; ++i)
232  result.push_back(ranges_[i].element_to_tile(index[i]));
233 
234  return result;
235  }
236 
238 
240  std::size_t rank() const { return ranges_.size(); }
241 
243 
246  const TiledRange1& dim(std::size_t d) const {
247  TA_ASSERT(d < rank());
248  return ranges_[d];
249  }
250 
252 
255  const Ranges& data() const { return ranges_; }
256 
257  void swap(TiledRange_& other) {
258  range_.swap(other.range_);
259  elements_range_.swap(other.elements_range_);
260  std::swap(ranges_, other.ranges_);
261  }
262 
263  template <typename Archive,
264  typename std::enable_if<madness::archive::is_input_archive<
265  Archive>::value>::type* = nullptr>
266  void serialize(const Archive& ar) {
267  ar& range_& elements_range_& ranges_;
268  }
269 
270  template <typename Archive,
271  typename std::enable_if<madness::archive::is_output_archive<
272  Archive>::value>::type* = nullptr>
273  void serialize(const Archive& ar) const {
274  ar& range_& elements_range_& ranges_;
275  }
276 
277  private:
278  range_type range_;
279  range_type elements_range_;
280  Ranges ranges_;
282 };
283 
285 
289 inline TiledRange operator*(const Permutation& p, const TiledRange& r) {
290  TA_ASSERT(r.tiles_range().rank() == p.dim());
291  TiledRange::Ranges data = p * r.data();
292 
293  return TiledRange(data.begin(), data.end());
294 }
295 
297 inline void swap(TiledRange& r0, TiledRange& r1) { r0.swap(r1); }
298 
300 inline bool operator==(const TiledRange& r1, const TiledRange& r2) {
301  return (r1.tiles_range().rank() == r2.tiles_range().rank()) &&
302  (r1.tiles_range() == r2.tiles_range()) &&
303  (r1.elements_range() == r2.elements_range()) &&
304  std::equal(r1.data().begin(), r1.data().end(), r2.data().begin());
305 }
306 
307 inline bool operator!=(const TiledRange& r1, const TiledRange& r2) {
308  return !operator==(r1, r2);
309 }
310 
311 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const TiledRange& rng) {
312  out << "("
313  << " tiles = " << rng.tiles_range()
314  << ", elements = " << rng.elements_range() << " )";
315  return out;
316 }
